title: Adele attended Drake's birthday party and she looked 🔥🔥
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Adele just shared her first Instagram picture in months, and fans can't get enough of her new look.

The singer attended Drake's party, and wished him a happy birthday.

Adele is notoriously quiet on social media, but her latest selfie is causing a stir. The 'Rolling in the Deep' singer uploaded a picture from Drake's birthday party at the weekend, and fans can't get enough of her sixties makeover.

Sharing a pouting selfie, she wrote: "I used to cry but now I sweat 😂#gingermckenna Happy birthday to one of the kindest and funniest people I’ve met @champagnepapi 🌹"

Drake also shared a bunch of pictures, including one of him giggling with the singer (you can see her in the ninth frame if you scroll right below)



Fans can't get enough of her new retro look, and are hoping it could be hinting at a new album.

There were rumours that the 31-year-old would be dropping new music today (October 25), but so far we're yet to hear anything. To be fair, though, she has had plenty going on recently - including the rumour that she's dating Skepta.



The singer announced splitting from her charity worker husband Simon Konecki back in April. She's usually pretty private about her personal life (fair play tbh) but did post this hilarious meme to her 31 million Instagram followers after the news broke.

While we're very much enjoying her excellent Instagram tekkers, we're with the fans on this one: drop the album, sis. Please.

Follow Abbi on Instagram.
